languages.text: "Я буду молиться, чтобы среди милостей, которыми вы осыплете астропатов, они не забыли о долге перед Императором".

traits.locale_text: "Я буду молиться, чтобы среди милостей, которыми вы осыплете астропатов, они не забыли о долге перед Императором".

languages.text: "I will pray that my Astropaths do not forget their duty to the Emperor while they are being showered with your largesse."
languages.original_text: "Я буду молиться, чтобы среди милостей, которыми вы осыплете астропатов, они не забыли о долге перед Императором".

traits.locale_text: "I will pray that my Astropaths do not forget their duty to the Emperor while they are being showered with your largesse."
"I will pray that my Astropaths do not forget their duty to the Emperor while they are being showered with your largesse."
"I will pray that my Astropaths do not forget their duty to the Emperor while they are being showered with your largesse."
"I will pray that my Astropaths do not forget their duty to the Emperor while they are being showered with your largesse."
"I will pray that my Astropaths do not forget their duty to the Emperor while they are being showered with your largesse."
"I will pray that my Astropaths do not forget their duty to the Emperor while they are being showered with your largesse."

languages.text: «Rezaré para que mis Astrópatas no olviden su deber hacia el Emperador mientras los colma de lujos».
languages.original_text: "I will pray that my Astropaths do not forget their duty to the Emperor while they are being showered with your largesse."

languages.text: 「私の感応通信官たちがあなたの寛大さに溺れて皇帝への聖務成就の誓いを忘れてしまわないよう、祈ることにしましょう」
languages.original_text: "I will pray that my Astropaths do not forget their duty to the Emperor while they are being showered with your largesse."

languages.text: “我只祈祷我的星语者在接受您的慷慨馈赠时，不会忘记他们对帝皇应付的责任。”
languages.original_text: "I will pray that my Astropaths do not forget their duty to the Emperor while they are being showered with your largesse."

languages.text: "Ich werde beten, dass meine Astropathen ihre Pflicht gegenüber dem Imperator nicht vergessen, während sie in Eurer Großzügigkeit baden."
languages.original_text: "I will pray that my Astropaths do not forget their duty to the Emperor while they are being showered with your largesse."

languages.text: « Je prierai pour que mes astropathes n'oublient pas leurs devoirs envers l'Empereur pendant qu'ils profiteront de vos largesses. »
languages.original_text: "I will pray that my Astropaths do not forget their duty to the Emperor while they are being showered with your largesse."

languages.text: "Astropatlarımın buyurduğunuz ihsan içinde yaşarken İmparator'a karşı vazifelerini unutmamaları için dua edeceğim."
languages.original_text: "I will pray that my Astropaths do not forget their duty to the Emperor while they are being showered with your largesse."
